subject: Shipping Issues?
description_text:
Hey, I ordered a set of VAM pro linear haptics on Dec 25th and haven't
received them or any kind of update about them since the "shipped" email I
received on Dec 30th. My order number is SSN5305. The tracking number I
received isn't providing any information at all and that number is:
SF6047201468970.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you

Clyde Simmons

conversations.body_text: Hi Trey Simmons,  ​It is found that your order was shipped on the 13th and is expected to arrive around the 21st.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468970

Thank you for the very quick response! Can't wait to get these installed!

On Mon, Jan 19, 2026, 2:08 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Trey Simmons,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
